metadata.title: CVE-2020-8163 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The is a code injection vulnerability in versions of Rails prior to 5.0.1 that wouldallow an attacker who controlled the `locals` argument of a `render` call to perform a RCE.

notes.note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
